title: Cryptolove20015
author: Cryptolove20015
content: Website          Twitter          Telegram          Telegram 1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Cryptolove20015 2. (4.5$ Zillaceo) tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on march 09, 2023 and will run until March 16, 2023.______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Cryptolove20015 may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joined campaigns if needed. Bounty Cryptolove20015 is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoing bounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread. Bounty Cryptolove20015 has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are only responsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Cryptolove20015 has. guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty." The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards by calculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet. Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published. However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.1. All participants must join Zillaceo official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and  Twitter page2. All participants must join Bounty Cryptolove20015  Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter .3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Cryptolove20015 Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.1.All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):      Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATION              Forum Username:              Forum Profile Link:              Telegram Username:              Participated Campaigns:              BSC Wallet Address:                   BOUNTY ALLOCATION                                        Twitter _ 50%                                         Telegram _50% week List 1 week _ 09.03.2023 _ 16.03.2023Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/week                            Rules:  1. Every participant must follow Zillaceo   Twitter page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use hashtags #zillaceo #zilla #bsc #elonmusk .------------ Google Form ------------                                     Rewards:                                            5 stakes/week                                   Rules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name (Zillaceo)(Example:  | Cryptolove20015 Ambassador)2. Replace your profile picture with Zillaceo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. You must wear Zillaceo avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.------------- Google Form -------------
